title: account is on the fritz
body: my account seems to have reverted to an old old email address and  old old password. I was just able to log onto it using the old information but now I cant. I cannot change the password casue I don't know it and I don't have the email that it is trying to send the code to anymore. not sure what to do but all my friends were deleted off of my friends list. it seems like it reverted it to a previous time. I don't know if this is due to server maintenance or the server going down when I was logged in. but I'm ranked Plat 5 and its not showing my plat badge only shows placements and wins and losses. any help would be appreciated. thanks

replies.body:
Server maintenance was causing some of the ranked info to not display. This should be resolved by now, so go ahead and restart your client to see if it display.

Let me know if you continue to see issues with your ranked info. As for your account, be sure you keep your account secure with [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)

Let me know if you have any questions.
seems like someone changed my password and everything so my account has been stolen..i cant gain access to it but I can see that the email was changed and obviously my passwords and stuff.

That's definitely not good! I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) right away!

Fill out your submission with as much information as you can recall about your account and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.
